<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Radio and Chat </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Sounds </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Enable and disable radio messages to be heard and shown in the left lower corner of the screen. This command can be helpful during cutscenes. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''enableRadio''' state </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> state: [[Boolean]] - true to enable the radio, false to disable it </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[enableRadio]] [[false]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value>  [[setSpeaker]], [[disableConversation]], [[enableSentences]], [[showSubtitles]]</value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
